titleStmt.title: The behaviour of John Hutchins in Newgate together with his dying words as he was going to be executed in Fleet- Street on Wednesday the 17th of December, 1684, for murdering of John Sparks, a waterman, near Serjeants-Inn, London, on Wednesday the 3d of December.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Samuel, 1620-1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
